Package com.example.shoppingcart.controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.shoppingcart.controllers.UserController
  • @Controller
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    COntroller class to accept all the requests and call respective methods to handle the requests. This implements the frontcontroller pattern which exposes the APIs in the form of REST

    • Constructor Summary

      UserController()
